group.label: CleverReach Settings
group.comment: The CleverReach plugin will synchronize all subscriptions and orders with your account.

field.label: API Key
field.comment: This can be found on your Listsettings page in CleverReach.

field.label: General Subscribers List ID
field.comment: Magento users who subscribe/unsubscribe to the newsletter will be added/removed from this CleverReach receiver list.

field.label: CleverReach Form ID
field.comment: Create new Form in your CleverReach backend, if you want to use Double Opt-in

field.label: Enable Orders Tracking
field.comment: Sync sales with CleverReach. Required for ordertracking. Note: this will currently NOT work with the Multishipping Checkout

field.label: Force synchronization of order Email addresses
field.comment: Emails from customers orders will be synchronized with CleverReach (even if they are not subscribed)

field.label: Enable M2E compatibility
field.comment: Exclude eBay/Amazon orders from force synchronization

field.label: Separate customers by groups automatically
field.comment: During customers synchronization, they will be inserted in associated CleverReach groups lists

field.label: Hide 'General' subscription for groups
field.comment: If 'No' - then not 'General' user group users, will have possibility to subscribe for both: 'General' and '% Group' newsletter. If 'Yes' - just to '% Groups' newsletter

field.label: Feed-URL
field.comment: Copy this Feed-URL to your CleverReach account. Store Id is optional parameter, add it in case, if you want use feed for other stores

field.label: Password
field.comment: Create your own password for CleverReach feed
